goal: Create an inspirational newsletter about starting a startup
summary: The user wants to encourage people who are interested in starting a startup. The newsletter will cover various topics related to starting a startup and will be in a mixed format of informative articles and Q&A sections.

assistants.name: Content Strategist
assistants.responsibility: Plan the overall structure and topics of the newsletter
assistants.bg_knowledge: The user wants to encourage people to start a startup. The tone should be inspirational.

assistants.name: Writer
assistants.responsibility: Write the articles and Q&A sections in an inspirational tone
assistants.bg_knowledge: The user wants to encourage people to start a startup. The tone should be inspirational. The topics include identifying a business idea, creating a business plan, finding investors, building a team, and marketing your product.

assistants.name: Editor
assistants.responsibility: Review and edit the written content to ensure it is engaging and free of errors
assistants.bg_knowledge: The user wants to encourage people to start a startup. The tone should be inspirational.
